This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in {{BE}} 1.8.x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with the ''Bedrock Edition'' 1.7.x releases.

== Mobs ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}} 
|-
| [[Cat]]
| {{animate|Tuxedo Cat.png;Siamese Cat JE2 BE2.png;Red Cat.png;Persian Cat.png;Ragdoll Cat.png;White Cat.png;Jellie Cat.png;Black Cat.png;Tabby Cat.png;British Shorthair Cat.png;Calico Cat.png|128px}}
|
* Stray cats can be found wandering in villages.
* A single stray black cat can be found inside [[witch hut]]s.
| {{Drop|Item|String|0|2}} 
|
* Cats can be tamed with raw fish.
* [[Phantom]]s will not swoop in to attack a player if a cat is nearby.
* Cats will seek active furnaces, beds, and chests to sit on.
* When waking up from a bed, there is a chance a tamed cat will give their owner one [[rabbits foot]], [[rabbit hide]], [[string]], [[rotten flesh]], [[feather]], [[raw chicken]], or [[phantom membrane]].
|-
| [[Panda]]
| [[File:Panda.png|128px]]
| Pandas spawn in [[bamboo forest]] biomes.
| {{Drop|Item|Bamboo|0|2}} 
|
* Pandas can spawn with either an aggressive, lazy, playful, weak or worried personality.
* Pandas will eat [[bamboo]], but can only be bred if there are at least eight bamboo blocks within five blocks of each panda.
* Pandas will pick up and eat [[cake]] that is thrown to them.
* Worried pandas will shake and cover their face during [[thunderstorm]]s.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}} 
|-
| [[Ocelot]]s
| [[File:Ocelot.png|128px]]
| Ocelots can no longer be tamed to get cats.
|-
| [[Phantom]]
| [[File:Phantom.png|128px]]
| Phantoms will no longer swoop to attack a player if a cat is nearby.
|}

== Blocks ==
=== New ===
{| {{Simple Guide table|New Blocks}}
|-
| [[Bamboo]]
| [[File:Small Leaves Bamboo.png|84px]]
|
* Can be found while [[fishing]] in jungles and will appear in some loot chests.
* Generating naturally in the world will come in the following updates.
|
* Bamboo can be broken with any tool as well as by hand.
* Bamboo will not break instantly when hit by any sword.  Bamboo will break instantly when hit by a sword in JAVA edition only.
|
* Bamboo can be used to craft [[scaffolding]].
* Bamboo can be used to craft [[sticks]].
* Bamboo can be feed to [[panda]]s, this can be used to speed up the growth of baby pandas.
* Bamboo can be planted on [[grass]], [[dirt]], [[sand]], [[podzol]], [[coarse dirt]], or [[red sand]].
* Bamboo will grow to between twelve and sixteen blocks tall.
|-
| [[Scaffolding]]
| [[File:Scaffolding.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting|A1=Bamboo|B1=String|C1=Bamboo|A2=Bamboo|C2=Bamboo|A3=Bamboo|C3=Bamboo|Output=Scaffolding,6}} 
| Scaffolding can be broken with any tool as well as by hand. When broken all connected scaffolding will break as well.
|
* Scaffolding is designed to be used for building in survival.
* Standing in scaffolding and {{control|jumping}} will allow the player to climb, while {{control|sneaking}} will allow the player to descend through the scaffolding. If there is no block below the scaffolding block the player is on the player will not descend through the block.
|}

=== Changed ===
{| {{Simple Guide table|Changed Blocks}} 
|-
| [[Command block]]
| [[File:Impulse Command Block.gif|84px]]
| Now have the default name of "!" instead of "@".
|-
| [[Packed ice]]
| [[File:Packed Ice.png|84px]]
| Can now be crafted with ice.
|-
| [[Shulker box]]
| [[File:Shulker Box.png|84px]]
| Added a recipe for undyed shulker boxes.
|}
